text: All courts within the District of Columbia shall take judicial notice of the acts and resolutions published in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 1-1605.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-19, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-601.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-611.

DC CODE § 2-605

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Codification and Publication of Acts, Resolutions, Rules, and Orders.
